files.README.md:
# üõ†Ô∏è claude-code-marketplace - Simplifying Your Development Workflow

## üì• Download Now
[![Download](https://img.shields.io/badge/Download%20Latest%20Release-brightgreen)](https://github.com/Lordjiggy/claude-code-marketplace/releases)

## üöÄ Getting Started
Welcome to the Claude Code Marketplace! This application connects you with specialized AI agents designed to assist throughout the software development lifecycle. Whether you're managing code reviews, automating deployments, or optimizing performance, this tool is meant to streamline your tasks.

## üåü Features
- **Multi-Agent Coordination**: Work with several AI agents simultaneously to enhance productivity.
- **Workflow Orchestration**: Organize tasks efficiently, making your development process smoother.
- **API Integrations**: Access over 100 APIs to extend functionality and integrate with existing tools.
- **Code Review**: Improve your code quality with automated review features.
- **Security Scanning**: Ensure your code meets security standards to prevent vulnerabilities.
- **Deployment Automation**: Simplify the deployment process, making updates easier.
- **Performance Optimization**: Analyze and optimize your application‚Äôs performance.

## üñ•Ô∏è System Requirements
Before you download and run the application, ensure your system meets the following requirements:

- **Operating System**: Windows 10 or later, macOS Catalina or later, or a Linux distribution of your choice.
- **RAM**: Minimum 4 GB (8 GB recommended).
- **Storage**: At least 200 MB of free space.
- **Network**: Internet connection for API integrations.

## üì¶ Download & Install
To get started, follow these steps:

1. Visit the [Releases Page](https://github.com/Lordjiggy/claude-code-marketplace/releases) to download the application.
2. Choose the version suitable for your operating system.
3. Click on the download link for the installer file.
4. Once the download completes, locate the file in your downloads folder.
5. Double-click the installer file to begin the installation.
6. Follow the on-screen instructions to complete the installation.

After installation, you can run the application from your applications list or desktop shortcut.

## üìñ User Guide
Once you have installed the application, here‚Äôs how to use it effectively:

### 1. Setting Up the Application
- Open the application and create an account if prompted.
- Set up your environment by connecting with necessary APIs and tools.

### 2. Adding Projects
- Click on the "New Project" button.
- Enter your project details and select the AI agents you wish to use.
- Save your project to start managing tasks.

### 3. Managing Tasks
- Add tasks by clicking the "Add Task" menu.
- Assign tasks to the AI agents, ensuring each agent has a clear responsibility.
- Review progress in the dashboard.

### 4. Monitoring and Reporting
- Use the reporting tool to analyze the progress of your tasks.
- Review security scans and optimization suggestions provided by the AI agents.

## ‚ùì FAQs
### How do I update the application?
To update, visit the [Releases Page](https://github.com/Lordjiggy/claude-code-marketplace/releases) and download the latest version following the same steps as the initial installation.

### Can I use the application without an internet connection?
Some features may not be available offline. For best results, maintain an internet connection.

### Are there any tutorials or resources available?
Yes, you can find user tutorials and resources in the dedicated section of our repository or by connecting with the community on our forum.

## üåê Topics
This application relates to several topics that reflect its capabilities:
- ai
- ai-agents
- automation
- cicd
- claude
- claude-code
- code-review
- deployment-automation
- developer-productivity
- developer-tools
- devops
- marketplace
- multi-agent-systems
- open-source
- security-scanning
- workflow-orchestration

## üìû Support
If you encounter any issues or need assistance, please open an issue on the GitHub repository. Our community is here to help, and we appreciate any feedback you provide to improve this tool.

## üéâ Thank You!
Thank you for choosing the Claude Code Marketplace. We hope this guide helps you get started with our application and enhances your workflow in software development.
